facebook.title: Can we trust Big Tobacco to promote public health?
facebook.summary:
There’s a new catchcry in public health: people working in tobacco control should join with Big Tobacco to promote “safer” tobacco products.

It runs like this: before starting work each morning, tobacco company employees sing with gusto the company song “

facebook.title: Can we trust Big Tobacco to promote public health?
facebook.summary: "There’s a new catchcry in public health: people working in tobacco control should join with Big Tobacco to promote “safer” tobacco products. It runs like this: before starting work each morning, tobacco company employees sing with gusto the company song “
